lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Some companies would be sold in their entirety and others would be privatised only partially, according to jose palomino, president of the government's state company holding firm, the national development council (conade).

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Last november, palomino said conade's plans included the possible sale of a company producing palm oil and another manufacturing electrical appliances.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Jose antonio almenara, the general manager of the lima stock exchange, where shares of the state-owned firms could be sold, told reuters that the only foreigners who could purchase stock at the exchange had to be tax-paying residents of peru.
